content: needle sew the entire length of the handles/sides over the cord when you have about 6 more left to sew closed trim the cord if needed then sew both ends of cord firmly together and finish sewing closed tips 1 check the cord every couple of inches to make sure it isn t twisting 2 as you sew the cord into the 2nd handle make sure it s the same length as the 1st handle you can adjust the handle length by pushing or stretching the crochet work 3 don t stretch your crochet long-wise while sewing to maintain good coverage of the cord a note about the colors this pattern works well with variegated thread especially the mesh portion for the unicorn bag i used multiple colors of variegated and solid threads to achieve the color effect i crocheted 2 strands of #30 thread together instead of using #10 thread the colors i used are  mesh o variegated dark pink o variegated light pink o variegated purple o variegated lavender o variegated blue o variegated light blue o white o variegated light green o green © marsha glassner 2018 o variegated light yellow o variegated dark yellow o variegated light orange  top front/back o variegated purple/blue/green/white + white  handles & sides o pastel variegated + variegated dark pink in the photo below the gold-colored bag hasn t been used yet the unicorn bag looks larger because it has stretched from use have fun © marsha glassner 2018
